title: Knowledge-Sharing Strategies to Strengthen Organizational Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational organizational behavior and management theories
context.additional_context: Case analysis and discussion of organizational learning applicable to the mathematics domain.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of transformational leadership elements on organizational climate formation.
Learners can analyze the mediating effect of knowledge-sharing behaviors on organizational learning outcomes.
Learners can design efficient knowledge-transfer systems by applying organizational learning models to mathematical problem-solving processes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
